sub_topic: Probability of winning a game of chance
message_1: A carnival game involves spinning a wheel that is divided into 10 equal sections, with each section numbered from 1 to 10. If you pay $2 to play the game and you win $10 if the wheel lands on 7 or 8, what is the probability of winning?
message_2:
There are 10 equal sections on the wheel, and you win if the wheel lands on either 7 or 8. There are 2 winning sections (7 and 8) out of the 10 total sections. Therefore, the probability of winning is:

2 winning sections / 10 total sections = 1/5 or 0.2

So, the probability of winning is 0.2 or 20%.
